data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Lékoumou, Republic of Congo.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lékoumou, Republic of Congo
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Lékoumou, Republic of Congo, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Lékoumou words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Lékoumou, Republic of Congo to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the South Asian, general people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 11,415 believers living in the state of Lékoumou. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Lékoumou that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Lékoumou, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

location.name: Lékoumou
location.people_groups_list: Teke, Northern, Arab, Hausa, Mbosi, Pygmy, Bayaka
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Teke, Northern (87,000), Arab (1,200), Hausa (11,000), Mbosi (557,000), Pygmy, Bayaka (41,000)
